Title: Barren Lives
Writer: Nelson Pereira dos Santos, Graciliano Ramos (novel)
Actors: Átila Iório, Maria Ribeiro, Orlando Macedo, Joffre Soares
Plot: A poor family in the Northeast of Brazil (Fabiano, the father; Sinhá Vitória, the mother; their 2 children and a dog called Baleia) wander about the barren land searching for a better place to live, with food and work. But the drought and misery destroy their hopes.
